word: Need for Women Counselors.--If any woman, no matter who, casts herself upon your sympathy, [ADDRESSED TO A CONFERENCE PRESIDENT.--COMPILERS.] are you to take her up and encourage her and receive letters from her and feel a special responsibility to help her? My brother, you should change your course with regard to such matters, and set a right example before your brother ministers. Keep your sympathy for the members of your own family, who need all that you can give them.
